author: Jon Brodkin
title: Pandemic hasn’t crushed broadband networks—even rural areas are doing ok
description: Pandemic-related broadband surge is hitting a plateau, data suggests.
content:
9 with 8 posters participating
The sharp growth in residential-broadband traffic seen during the pandemic is starting to level off, new data shows. While Internet speeds have slowed somewhat in many parts of the United States, it turns out that even rural-br… [+5916 chars]
